mapper.select: SELECT t.id as task_id, t.title as task_title, t.description as task_description, t.tag as t_tag, t.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, t.status as task_status FROM tasks t WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.id as task_id, t.title as task_title, t.description as task_description, t.tag as t_tag, t.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, t.status as task_status FROM tasks t JOIN users_tasks ut on t.id = ut.task_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tasks SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, tag = #{tag}, expiration_date = #{expirationDate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks (title, description, tag, expiration_date, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{tag}, #{expirationDate}, #{status})
